extendedInfo.description: View real-time UK train information directly from your mobile. View live train departure and arrival times for all UK train stations. You can also add real-time board widgets directly to your home screen.Features:* Live departures and arrivals powered by National Rail Enquiries.* Find your closest station, get walking directions.* Realtime delay and platform information.* Unlimited home screen widgets for frequently accessed information boards* Completely free!View train information from the following train operators: Arriva Trains Wales/Trenau Arriva Cymru, c2c, Caledonian Sleeper, Chiltern Railways, CrossCountry, East Coast, East Midlands Trains, Eurostar, First Capital Connect, First Great Western, First Hull Trains, First ScotRail, First TransPennine Express, Gatwick Express, Grand Central, Greater Anglia, Heathrow Connect, Heathrow Express, Island Line Trains, London Midland, London Overground, Merseyrail, Night Riviera, North Yorkshire Moors Railway, Southeastern, Southern, South West Trains, Stansted Express, Virgin Trains and West Coast Railway Company.Supported countries: England, Scotland, Wales.Supports over 2500 stations in the UK, including: Birmingham New Street, Edinburgh Waverley, Glasgow Central, Leeds, Liverpool Lime Street, Manchester Piccadilly, Brighton, Bristol Parkway, Bristol Temple Meads, Cardiff Central, Cardiff Queen Street, Crewe, Doncaster, Gatwick Airport, Glasgow Queen Street, Manchester Victoria, Newcastle, Nottingham, Reading, Sheffield, Southampton Central, York, Cannon Street, Charing Cross, Euston, Fenchurch Street, King's Cross, Liverpool Street, London Bridge, Paddington, St Pancras, Victoria, Waterloo, Blackfriars, Clapham Junction, City Thameslink, Marylebone, Moorgate, Stratford and Waterloo East

reviews.title: Excellent app
reviews.comment: I\'ve been using this app for 8 months already, and I can only say that is one of the greatest ways to find out the hours of UK trains. I\'m  Completetly satisfied!!
reviews.author: Mar\303\255a Mart\303\255n

reviews.title: Simple, works great
reviews.comment: Very handy app, accurate and easy to use :)
reviews.author: Christianna Rachel G\303\265es

reviews.title: All rail users need this!
reviews.comment: Whether a casual train traveler or a hard core commuter this will save you time and stress. Makes planning connections a breeze. Fantastic user friendly genius.
reviews.author: Karen Ellis

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Does pretty much what it says. Would be better if it wasn\'t so rigid but it\'s good to have to know about cancelled trains etc!
reviews.author: Angela Kakar

reviews.title: First Class
reviews.comment: Excellent app very user friendly and superb info
reviews.author: Campbell Oliver

reviews.title: love it.
reviews.comment: as flight crew I need to know when my train is actually going to arrive. this app does exactly that and does it well! simple and effective. well done. 5 stars.
reviews.author: Duncan Macdonald

reviews.title: Very useful
reviews.comment: Works well, I use it frequently. The favourites feature is particularly useful once you\'ve set it up.  One minor niggle: once a train has left a station, selecting that train gives an error that information is no longer available, which is inconvenient if you\'ve just boarded that train, say. A workaround is to select it from the destination station instead.
reviews.author: Daira Hopwood

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Needs a journey planner option though, so you know where to change stations en route if needed. This is handy for when you travel in a different area and aren\'t sure of the route
reviews.author: Roger Spencer

reviews.title: Outstanding App!
reviews.comment: Excellent app which is very simple to use and provides live UK train updates to your phone. I\'m highly impressed with this app, so paid to remove the adds and highly recommend it to other train users!
reviews.author: Thomas Milles

reviews.title: It\'s not bad, but still some flaw
reviews.comment: The interface is ugly and definitely requires improvement.  The search box requires an update too as I can\'t search for either station code or anything within the station name.  I love the map integration and the live status.
reviews.author: Andrea Moro

reviews.title: Helps you keeps a seat
reviews.comment: As the signs at London Waterloo are not visible from any seats, this app is fantastic. Shows all the live boards which you can filter with you destination. Helped me find my train, so thank you for that.  Man does it eat up the battery though.
reviews.author: Jonathan Williams

reviews.comment: Invaluable tool as a taxi driver - adverts a bit too much tho - otherwise app brilliant !!
reviews.author: Karen Harmer

reviews.title: Brilliant
reviews.comment: Gets all travel connections I need. Great organiser for travelling needs. Such a brilliant app so not having to run around like headless chicken ta......
reviews.author: joshua shewan

reviews.title: Missing stations like WFJ
reviews.comment: Important stations like WFJ not showing in live train tracking. Otherwise a very functional app. Keep up the good work!
reviews.author: Wajid Mannan

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Great app. Better than the National Rail one if you just want live train times. Some things could be improved though like putting in the station code to search.
reviews.author: Naruto Uzumaki

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: One of the best apps out there.  If you are a commuter, then it\'s a must app to have.
reviews.author: Mathew Richardson

reviews.title: The best in cat.
reviews.comment: Once fav routes set up it\'s quick simple access with just one touch.
reviews.author: Les Morris

reviews.title: This is perfect
reviews.comment: It gives you necessary information about rail timetables. Smart, intituitive and efficient. It is helping me a lot!
reviews.author: Jos\303\251 Manuel Violero Lara

reviews.title: Very useful
reviews.comment: Recommend for everybody I\'m travel. It find station for you, give timetable and you can track your train.
reviews.author: Henryk Pietrzyk

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Gave me the exact information i wanted. Told where about the train was and what time it will be arriving at the station...
reviews.author: Asim Hussain
